name: Solitary Refinement
description:
I made this game for the 181 weekly game jam on new years eve because if not then, when?
This is my third jam so any advice is oh so welcome.

It's a morning, a dark January morning. The year is 2020, many years from now. A virus has struck the world, the majority of the global population are to be housebound for the year.
The government, trying to pre-empt the psycological effect this will have on people have contacted YOU. A master of your trade, extreme procrastionation.
They have pleaded that you, a god among mortals, would show the people of the world how to most effectively whittle away the hours whilst keeping your mind stimulated.

I can harbour no blame for any RSIs that occur as a result. Love to all and I wish you a merry Itchmass/new year.
